1.0.name: wordpress/lastfm-post-extension
1.0.description: It gets the last song you listened to from your Last.fm Profile and add its to your Posts Metadata. Via the Tagfunction the_music() you can show the formated song information on your post page. No Last.fm Password is needed, only your Username.
